name: TotalSledDogRaceNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Total Sled Dog Race News Feed will feature the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race as the first sled dog race for this briefing, but other races will be added. i.e.. Yukon Quest 1,000, Kubuk 440 etc. Once a day complete team listing will be posted. Normally the list of mushers will be those that have changed since last full listing or major update.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
